list.abs: ～+名词air bedclothes 晒床单air clothing 晒衣服
This bedclothes is very clean ., 这床铺盖是非常干净的.
pressing down the button of the alarm-clock , he curled up for a last warm moment under the bedclothes .他把闹钟的按钮按下，蜷缩在被子下面，享受最后一刻的温暖。
presently the bedclothes began to slip away slowly toward the foot of the bed , as if some one were pulling them !不久我的睡衣开始慢慢的滑向床底，好像有什么东西在拉它们！
the bedclothes caught fire and the whole house was burnt down .寝具引起火灾，并且整个房子都烧毁了。

entry.def: Bedclothes are the sheets and covers which you put over yourself when you get into bed.

means.word_mean: 1. coverings that are used on a bed
